	if(siteSectionOverrideVal.length > 0 && (siteSectionOverrideVal.toUpperCase().trim() == 'NA')){
		siteOverrideValueProp5='';
	}else if((siteSectionOverrideVal.length > 0 && siteSectionOverrideVal.toUpperCase().trim() != 'NA')){
		siteOverrideValueProp5 = siteSectionOverrideVal.toLowerCase().trim();
	}else if(siteSectionOverrideVal.length == 0){
		if(temp_Name == 'genericerrorpage'){
			siteOverrideValueProp5 = '404_error';
		}
		else if(temp_Name == 'nonsupportedpage'){
			siteOverrideValueProp5 = 'not_supported';
		}else if((temp_Name == 'rfpformpage') || (temp_Name == 'contactuspage')|| (temp_Name == 'deloitteformstemplate')){
			siteOverrideValueProp5 = 'forms';
		}else if((temp_Name == 'searchResultsTemplate') || (temp_Name == 'internalSearchResultsTemplate')){
			siteOverrideValueProp5 = 'search_results';
		}else if((temp_Name == 'officedetailspage') || (temp_Name == 'officelocatorpage')|| (temp_Name == 'globalofficedirectorypage')){
			siteOverrideValueProp5 = 'office_information';
		}else if(temp_Name == 'companyinformationpage'){
			siteOverrideValueProp5 = 'legal';
		}else if(temp_Name == 'moreondeloittepage'){
			siteOverrideValueProp5 = 'company_information';
		}else if(temp_Name == 'pressreleasespagetemplate'){
			siteOverrideValueProp5 = 'press_releases';
		}else if((temp_Name == 'fulltopicpage') || (temp_Name == 'articlepage')|| (temp_Name == 'solutionpage')|| (temp_Name == 'eventpage')|| (temp_Name == 'careerpage')){
			siteOverrideValueProp5 ='industry';
		}else if(temp_Name == "memberfirmhomepage" || temp_Name == "globalhomepage") {              
			siteOverrideValueProp5 = 'home';
		}else if(temp_Name == "thankyoupage") {
			siteOverrideValueProp5 = 'thank_you';
		}else if(temp_Name == "dynamiclisttemplate") {
			siteOverrideValueProp5 = 'dynamiclist';
		}else if(temp_Name == "htmlfragmentpage") {
			siteOverrideValueProp5 = 'landingpage';
		}else if(temp_Name == "blog-collection-template") {
            siteOverrideValueProp5 = 'blog_collection';
        }else if(temp_Name == "blog-post-template") {
            siteOverrideValueProp5 = 'blog-post';
		}
	}       

	if(temp_Name == "memberfirmhomepage" || temp_Name == "globalhomepage") {
		 sc_channel = 'Homepage';
	} else if(temp_Name == "thankyoupage") {
	   sc_channel = 'Thankyou';
	}
	sc_secondLevelForProp5 = siteOverrideValueProp5;
	searchLocation = '//www2.deloitte.com/us/en/misc/search.html';

   		 }
	}

<script type="text/javascript">
	 function loadScript(scriptURL){
        // load script
        var scriptTAG = document.createElement('script');
        scriptTAG.type = 'application/javascript';
        scriptTAG.async = true;
        scriptTAG.src = scriptURL;
        document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(scriptTAG);
      }

      function loadCSS(CSSURL){
        // load css
        var linkTAG = document.createElement('link');
        linkTAG.rel = "stylesheet";
        linkTAG.type = 'text/css';
        linkTAG.href = CSSURL;
        document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(linkTAG);
      }
      if(!navigator.onLine){
      	loadCSS('/etc.clientlibs/shared/clientlibs/clientlib-base.min.css');
        loadCSS('/etc.clientlibs/shared/clientlibs/clientlib-site.min.css');
        loadScript('/etc.clientlibs/shared/clientlibs/clientlib-base.min.js');
      	templateType = dataLayer.page.attributes.pageTemplate;
        // for event details template
      	if(templateType == "Event_Details_Page_Template"){
      		loadCSS('/etc.clientlibs/shared/clientlibs/clientlib-critical/clientlib-critical-event-details.min.css');
      		loadCSS('/etc.clientlibs/shared/clientlibs/clientlib-site/templates/clientlib-site-event-details.min.css');
      	}
        // for blog post template
      	else if(templateType == "Blog_Post_Template"){

      		loadCSS('/etc.clientlibs/shared/clientlibs/clientlib-site/templates/clientlib-site-blog-post.min.css')
      	}
        // for DI Article and multimedia
        else if(templateType == "Deloitte_Insights_Article_And_Multimedia_Template"){
          loadCSS('/etc.clientlibs/deloitte-insights/clientlibs/clientlib-critical/clientlib-critical-di-insights-and-multimedia.min.css');

      }

                                            <div class="key-find-desc">
                                                <h1 class="key-find-heading">Many older Americans will sit this one out  again</h1>
                                                <p>
                                                    Older Americans, who had been showing more enthusiasm for travel after a prolonged pandemic-driven hesitance, are once again shying away. Only 22%
                                                    of Americans age 55 and older plan to travel, down from 36% in 2021. Financial worries are the top travel deterrent across age groups, but the
                                                    oldest are most likely to cite potential delays and cancellations as a reason to stay home.
                                                </p>
                                            </div>
                                            <a href="https://www2.deloitte.com/content/dam/insights/articles/us175738_holiday-retail-travel/DI_2022-Holiday-travel.pdf" target="_blank" class="download-report findings" tabindex="0" aria-label="Download the travel survey findings">

            <div class="finding-container">
                <div class="container">
                    <div class="row">
                        <!-- <div class="dim-border-top travel-border-head"></div> -->
                        <div class="travel-findings-heading col-lg-12 col-xl-6 col-md-12">
                            <h2>Travel key findings</h2>
                            <p class="subtitle">2022 Deloitte holiday travel survey</p>
                        </div>
                        <div class="col-xl-6 col-lg-12 travel-right p-md-0">
                            <div class="travel-summary">
                                After climbing upward for a year and a half, Americans enthusiasm for travel appears dampened this holiday season. Pandemic concerns are fading, but financial woes and
                                flight cancellations have more deciding to stay home. As travelers reconnect with family and friends, airlines and hotels should look to reestablish trust and high
                                service standards.
                            </div>
                            <a href="https://www2.deloitte.com/content/dam/insights/articles/us175738_holiday-retail-travel/DI_2022-Holiday-travel.pdf" target="_blank" class="download-report" tabindex="0" aria-label="Download the travel survey findings">
                                Download the travel survey findings
                            </a>
                        </div>
                        <div class="col-lg-12"></div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="key-finding-container">
                        <div class="row key-finding-row">
                            <a href="javascript:void(0)" class="col-xl-3 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-12 travel-card finding-card-box light-border-right opacity-animate" data-modal="5" data-title="key-finding-5" data-id="travel-key-findings" tabindex="0" data-analytics-label="travel-key-findings:open-concerns-about-money-popup" aria-label="Concerns about money and disruption curb travel">
                                <div class="key-card-no">1</div>
                                <div class="key-card-body" data-analytics-label="key-findings:concerns-about-money-title-click">
                                    <h6 class="key-card-title">Concerns about money and disruption curb travel</h6>
                                    <p class="key-card-desc">
                                        Financial considerations are this seasons biggest drag on travel demand, and one in five Americans staying home cite worries about travel disruption.
                                    </p>
                                </div>
                            </a>
                            <a href="javascript:void(0)" class="col-xl-3 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-12 travel-card finding-card-box light-border-right light-border-top opacity-animate" data-modal="6" data-id="travel-key-findings" tabindex="0" data-title="key-finding-6" data-analytics-label="travel-key-findings:open-from-a-busy-popup" aria-label="From a busy start to a strong long-tail finish">
                                <div class="key-card-no">2</div>
                                <div class="key-card-body" data-analytics-label="key-findings:from-a-busy-title-click">
                                    <h6 class="key-card-title">From a busy start to a strong long-tail finish</h6>
                                    <p class="key-card-desc">
                                        Once again, the busiest days will likely come at the start of the holiday travel season, as 15% of Americans plan to travel Thanksgiving weekend.
                                    </p>
                                </div>
                            </a>
                            <a href="javascript:void(0)" class="col-xl-3 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-12 travel-card finding-card-box light-border-right light-border-top opacity-animate" data-modal="7" data-title="key-finding-7" tabindex="0" data-id="travel-key-findings" data-analytics-label="travel-key-findings:open-demand-dips-across-popup" aria-label="Demand dips across most travel products">
                                <div class="key-card-no">3</div>
                                <div class="key-card-body" data-analytics-label="key-findings:demand-dips-across-title-click">
                                    <h6 class="key-card-title">Demand dips across most travel products</h6>
                                    <p class="key-card-desc">With fewer Americans traveling, demand will be weaker across most travel segments, but hotels can expect a bigger hit than airlines.</p>
                                </div>
                            </a>
                            <a href="javascript:void(0)" class="col-xl-3 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-12 travel-card finding-card-box opacity-animate light-border-top" data-modal="8" data-title="key-finding-8" tabindex="0" data-id="travel-key-findings" data-analytics-label="travel-key-findings:open-many-older-americans-popup" aria-label="Many older Americans will sit this one out">
                                <div class="key-card-no">4</div>
                                <div class="key-card-body" data-analytics-label="key-findings:many-older-americans-title-click">
                                    <h6 class="key-card-title">Many older Americans will sit this one out  again</h6>
                                    <p class="key-card-desc">Older Americans are more likely to cite potential travel disruption and health as reasons to avoid travel.</p>
                                </div>
                            </a>

    function getCookie(name) 
    {
        var dc = document.cookie;
        var prefix = name + "=";
        var begin = dc.indexOf("; " + prefix);
        if (begin == -1) {
            begin = dc.indexOf(prefix);
            if (begin != 0) return null;
        }
        else
        {
            begin += 2;
            var end = document.cookie.indexOf(";", begin);
            if (end == -1) {
                end = dc.length;
            }
        }
        return unescape(dc.substring(begin + prefix.length, end));
    }
